components.name: Breath Of The Eidolon
components.description: A gas found solely on the plains of Eidolon, refined to its purest form.

components.name: Cetus Wisp
components.description:
Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

components.name: Heart Nyth
components.description:
Polished and cut to perfection.
Location: Old Man Suumbaat in Cetus

components.name: Kuaka Spinal Claw
components.description:
The sinew from the Kuaka's spinal claws can be tanned to make resilient and flexible leather.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.2 + 23.0.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Channeled finishers with Zaws not activating Dispatch Overdrive or Exodia Brave.

components.name: Cetus Wisp
components.description:
Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

components.name: Neurodes
components.description:
Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.
Locations: Earth, Lua, Eris, and Orokin Derelicts.

components.name: Plastids
components.description:
A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.
Locations: Phobos, Saturn, Uranus, Pluto, and Eris.

components.name: Radian Sentirum
components.description:
Polished and cut to perfection.
Location: Old Man Suumbaat in Cetus

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Exodia Contagion now requires you to be Aim Gliding to launch the Infested energy projectile.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed KitGuns not applying negative damage modifiers for projectile based Chambers and Zaws not applying negative damage modifiers to projectiles launched from the Exodia Contagion Arcane.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.changes: Exodia Contagion’s Infested grenade 30 meter damage multiplier now also takes into account your combo multiplier.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Exodia Contagion's interaction with Covert Lethality, resulting in the +100 damage being applied to the projectile damage multiplier instead of the base projectile damage.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the range increase from Iron Vault scaling with Exodia Contagion.

components.name: Cetus Wisp
components.description:
Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.
Location: Plains of Eidolon

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Exodia Epidemic ground slam wave counting towards finisher damage instead of the intended explosion damage.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Zaws with Covert Lethality and Exodia Epidemic unintentionally insta killing enemies. Covert Lethality does not carry over to projectiles or other effects created by weapons, and only applies on Melee finishers.

components.description: A gas found solely on the plains of Eidolon, refined to its purest form.

components.name: Karkina Antenna
components.description:
Ground into a powder this substance can make fires burn hotter for a brief amount of time.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed elemental Status Effects applying to Exodia Force. Only base Damage Mods (Pressure Point) are meant to apply.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients not seeing Exodia Force FX.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Zephyr Prime 22.16.4
patchlogs.changes: Melee combo multiplier now applies to the radial blast of Exodia Force. This also fixes Exodia Force not scaling off of Modded Damage.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.2.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a black box HUD icon appearing when using a Zaw with the Exodia Triumph Arcane upgrade. This was an unintended Channeling Efficiency upgrade on top of its intended Channeling damage.

patchlogs.name: Mask of the Revenant: Hotfix 23.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Exodia Valor applying to Excalibur’s Exalted Blade.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Anomaly Arcane pulling Kuva Siphons, Eidolons, Lephantis, and other “boss” type enemies as reported here:

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Magus Elevate from 2300 to 230 Oxium per craft.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Firewall Arcane’s FX not appearing for Clients.

components.name: Cryotic
components.description:
Usually found in extreme sub-zero environments, Cryotic instantly freezes anything it contacts.
Locations: Excavation Missions on Venus, Earth, Phobos, Europa, and Neptune.

components.description: A material used in tailoring clothes and cultivating synthetics.

components.description:

components.name: Murkray Liver
components.description:
An ingredient used in Ostron cooking and medicines.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.4
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Magus Husk from 7100 to 710 Cryotic per item.

patchlogs.name: Equinox Prime: Hotfix 24.5.8 + 24.5.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Lockdown mine having collision on it, resulting in mid-air floating. You can no longer stand/climb on the mine.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.5.7
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed bosses/VIPs unintentionally receiving the full effect of Magus Lockdown. Magus Lockdown’s tether mechanic will apply but not the Puncture damage.
Fixed Magus Lockdown putting enemies into a permanent sleep.
Fixed Magus Lockdown beam visual FX not always being applied properly.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Lockdown using the position of your last Void Dash instead of your current one if you're a Client when placing the Mine.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Magus Revert now has a 3 second cooldown. This cooldown is a result of macro abuse in conjunction with Magus Lockdown and Madurai Meteoric Dash in order to deal an absurd amount of damage all at once. This change also fixes the issue:

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.3.0 - Nightwave
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Magus Lockdown using the wrong physical grenade mine mesh.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.11
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Lockdown not spawning an actual mine upon Void Dashing.

components.name: Eidolon Shard
components.description: Shard gained from the sentients roaming the Plains of Eidolon.

components.name: Heart Nyth
components.description:
Polished and cut to perfection.
Location: Old Man Suumbaat in Cetus

components.name: Polymer Bundle
components.description:
A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.
Locations: Mercury, Venus, and Uranus.

components.name: Seram Beetle Shell
components.description: This thick shell is used by Ostrons to manufacture tools and weapons.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.1.0: TennoGen Round 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Nourish not working with Umbra.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.3 - Limbo Prime
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Operator Magus Nourish not restoring Health over time to Umbra while Transference is active.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.4.4 + 24.4.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fix Magus Repair reviving downed Allies and applying to Operators as reported here: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1068311-magus-repair-instantly-revives-downed-allies/

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Repair not affecting Excalibur Umbra.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.3.0 - Nightwave
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Magus Repair replenishing your Warframe’s Health twice as quickly as intended.
Fixed Clients able to permanently continually heal your Warframe’s Health by Transferring in succession with Magus Repair equipped.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Magus Repair Operator Arcane not functioning for Clients.

components.name: Radian Sentirum
components.description:
Polished and cut to perfection.

components.name: Salvage
components.description:
High value metals collected from war salvage.
Locations: Mars, Jupiter, and Sedna.

components.name: Seram Beetle Shell
components.description: This thick shell is used by Ostrons to manufacture tools and weapons.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.15.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed an un-advertised Duration from Magus Replenish

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Magus Revert now has a 3 second cooldown. This cooldown is a result of macro abuse in conjunction with Magus Lockdown and Madurai Meteoric Dash in order to deal an absurd amount of damage all at once. This change also fixes the issue:

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.8
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Magus Revert consuming Energy on the second Void Dash (revert). 
Fixed Magus Revert not placing the Operator back at the original position when initially casted for Clients.
Fixed Magus Revert causing Void Dashes to not use any Energy for Clients.

components.name: Alloy Plate
components.description:
Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
Locations: Venus, Phobos, Ceres, Jupiter, Pluto, and Sedna.

components.name: Fish Scales
components.description: A material used in tailoring clothes and cultivating synthetics.

components.name: Entroplasma
components.description:
A solvent that reconstitutes waste product from the Weeping Towers into degenerated matter.
Acquired by disassembling Tromyzon servofish.

components.name: Gorgaricus Spore
components.description: The reproductive spore of the giant Vallis fungi is highly coveted for the complex chemical compounds it contains.

components.name: Radiant Zodian
components.description: Polished and cut to perfection.

components.name: Rotoblade
components.description:
A machine element used to propel robotic organisms through coolant.
Acquired by disassembling Eye-Eye servofish.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: The Profit-Taker - Update 24.2
patchlogs.changes: Pax Bolt chance to activate increased from 50% to 100% at max rank.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.2 + 24.1.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pax Bolt triggering from Primary weapons.

components.name: Lathe Coagulant
components.description:
A liquid that mixes with coolant fluid to produce a resilient gel that repairs leaks.
Acquired by disassembling Longwinder servofish.

components.name: Mytocardia Spore
components.description: A fungal body prized for its varied uses.

components.name: Parallel Biode
components.description:
Controls the electrical flow throughout the circuitry within robotic organisms.
Acquired by disassembling Mirewinder servofish.

components.name: Radiant Zodian
components.description: Polished and cut to perfection.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kitgun reload sounds playing when firing with Pax Charge equipped.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
patchlogs.additions: Added a new sound for the Pax Charge Arcane.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: The Profit-Taker - Update 24.2
patchlogs.changes: Increased the recharge rate of Pax Charge when used with all Chambers apart from Catchmoon.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.2 + 24.1.2.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Pax Seeker activating on Warframe Exalted Ability Weapons (i.e. Titania Razorwing, Mesa Regulators).
Fixed Pax Seeker projectiles and Phantasma’s Alt Fire ignoring Nullifier bubbles.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.1 + 24.1.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pax Seeker projectiles not showing up for Clients.

components.name: Ecosynth Analyzer
components.description:
A processing unit that efficiently monitors environmental data.
Acquired by disassembling Synathid servofish.

components.name: Marquise Thyst
components.description: Polished and cut to perfection.

components.name: Tepa Nodule
components.description: The irradescent nodules on these plants glow brightly in cold environments.

components.name: Thermal Laser
components.description:
A weapon that discharges lasers over short distances.
Acquired by disassembling Kriller servofish.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon Remaster: Update 24.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Pax Soar Arcane buffs taking effect even when your Kitgun is unequipped.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: The Profit-Taker - Update 24.2
patchlogs.changes: Pax Soar now also reduces the effect of gravity when firing a Kitgun.
